plugin.name: Tidy up NotePlan notes
plugin.description: Delete multiple blank lines, empty todos and bullets, etc.
plugin.author: Jonathan Clark

plugin.commands.name: tidy-recent
plugin.commands.description: Tidy all notes changed in last 8 hours (configure using 'hours_to_process' preference), unless the filename matches the 'exclude_glob' preference

plugin.preferences.name: ignore_file_regex
plugin.preferences.description: A regular expression that identifies files to ignore when tidying

plugin.preferences.name: ignore_today
plugin.preferences.description: Don't tidy up today's daily note file

plugin.preferences.name: hours_to_process
plugin.preferences.description: When running over all notes, include all notes changed within this number of hours before now

plugin.preferences.name: remove_scheduled
plugin.preferences.description: Remove the scheduled '>date' of completed tasks if present

plugin.preferences.name: tags_to_remove
plugin.preferences.description: Comma-separated list of Tags to remove from completed tasks
